mapper.select: SELECT C.COUPON_TITLE, C.COUPON_DESCRIPTION, C.COUPON_DISCOUNT_RATE, C.COUPON_AVAILABLE_TYPE, MC.MEMBER_ID, MC.COUPON_EXPIRE_DATE FROM TBL_COUPON C JOIN TBL_MEMBER_COUPON MC ON MC.COUPON_ID = C.COUPON_ID WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER_COUPON (MEMBER_COUPON_ID, MEMBER_ID, COUPON_ID) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_COUPON.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{couponId})
